hooks.command: bash -c 'CMD=$(jq -r ".tool_input.command" 2>/dev/null); PROTECTED="(\.claude/settings\.json|scripts/pre-commit-check\.sh|scripts/check-ci-status\.sh|scripts/track-push\.sh)"; if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "(git restore|git checkout|rm|rm -rf|rm -f).*$PROTECTED"; then echo "❌ BLOCKED: Cannot delete or restore protected hook files"; exit 2; fi; if echo "$CMD" | grep -qiE "Co-Authored-By|Generated with"; then echo "❌ BLOCKED: Do not add Co-Authored-By or Generated with lines in commits."; exit 2; fi; exit 0'

bash -c 'CONTENT=$(jq -r ".tool_input.content // .tool_input.new_string // empty" 2>/dev/null); if echo "$CONTENT" | grep -qE "eslint-disable|@ts-ignore|@ts-nocheck|@ts-expect-error"; then echo "❌ BLOCKED: Do not use eslint-disable, @ts-ignore, @ts-nocheck, or @ts-expect-error. Fix the issue properly."; exit 2; fi; exit 0'
bash -c 'CMD=$(cat | jq -r ".tool_input.command // empty" 2>/dev/null); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "git push"; then bash /home/muhammed/monorepo/console/scripts/track-push.sh; fi'
